website_summaries.verdict: A unique set of adhesive remover wipes to keep for the occasional spill or spot removal.
pros: Large pack of adhesive remover wipes are individually wrapped
The box is small and easily stores in a bag to take on the go
cons: Wipes leave a little residue on most surfaces, so you might need to clean the surface after use

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: As a type 1 diabetic I am constantly removing adhesive residue from my skin when I swap out the parts of my insulin pump and glucose monitor that are stuck to my body. That's why I bought this, but I find that I also use it quite a bit to get the gunk off after I pull off a Band-Aid or whatever. I think it would be worthwhile to have this around even if you only use it very occasionally for that sort of thing--it's very effective. I use it infrequently enough that a box lasts for multiple years, but I've never had a problem with the pads drying out in their individual foil packets.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this to help remove a CGM adhesive when it came time to change. This thing works real good. We start by applying it on top of the tape/bandage part and it quickly penetrates and dissolves the adhesive underneath it like no other. The single packs makes it easy to use and is just enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dvsjp79

customer_reviews.title: Great for Removing Ostomy Pouches and Flanges from Skin, or Any Adhesive from the Skin
customer_reviews.text: These are a must-have for new ostomy patients having trouble with leaks and frequent bag changes. Save your skin and have plenty of Uni-Solve on hand to remove the hydrocolloid adhesive from your skin, especially if you are finding yourself having to change out bags or flanges every day or couple of days due to leaks or other challenges. Just be sure to wash off all of the residue from your skin before applying the fresh bag/flange, or you may have trouble adhering. These wipes also do a great job removing hospital tape and heart monitor adhesive, etc. Any adhesive residue on the skin is easily removed using Uni-Solve. It's like an eraser for glue.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for removing transdermal patches.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say beyond the obvious. They remove adhesive. I have a medication that I have to take via transdermal patches and those things stick to me like limpets. Using these towelettes makes it easy to get the old patch off. I tried other adhesive removers and they usually irritated my skin. This stuff is gentle as far as I can tell and it's very handy to have pre-moistened towelettes that are self-contained and easy to transport (especially when flying.)
customer_reviews.author: PStJTT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product/ excelente producto
customer_reviews.text: Un muy buen producto. Anteriormente usaba otra marca y mi niño siempre se quejaba de dolor y molestia, con estos eso no sucede. La primera vez que los usamos el mismo me dijo: mamá estos son mejores que los otros, no me duele. Vienen bastante mojaditos y al pasarlo por encima del adhesivo rápido lo comieza a despegar. A very good product. Previously, I used another brand and my boy always complained of pain and trouble, with these that doesn't happen. The first time we used them the same thing he said to me, Mom, these are better than the others, it doesn't hurt. They come pretty wet and pass it over the adhesive fast, I'll take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cely

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Estrogen Transdermal patches following a hysterectomy. These prescription patches really stick to the skin and leave adhesive behind upon removal. They also require that they be placed on the lower abdomen which right now is quite tender from the surgery. It was getting painful taking the patches off and then trying to rub off the adhesive. This is my first time buying this product and I am so glad I did! These wipes work great!! No more pain, no more scratching my skin. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Me

customer_reviews.title: These are the best to use to remove any adhesive from a medical patch.
customer_reviews.text: If you are having difficulty remove adhesives left behind by medical patches you are using the wrong solution. These adhesive removers immediately remove any adhesive without harming sensitive skin. There is no reason to have to use extreme force. It dissolves the adhesives with little work. A little soap & water with remove any solution left behind due to the oiliness of the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works VERY, VERY WELL!!!!! PLEASED!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME!!! AWESOME!!! I recently had surgery and the tape residue was irritating my skin. This stuff took it right off. No skin irritation at all. I also wear patches and change them every few days.... always struggled with the residue.... not anymore with these things. One little packet takes off a lot. I WILL be ordering more. This stuff works!!!! The price wasn't too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Chell

customer_reviews.title: Uni-solve wipes work great as an adhesive solvent
customer_reviews.text: I have moderately sensitive skin...if I just pull off adhesive tape, I develop a welt that lasts for a couple of days. Uni-solve pretty much eliminates that problem. The solvent works well to soften the adhesive and allow the tape to be easily removed. (I'm using Hypafix tape to hold down Dexcom blood glucose sensors past their normal life span. The Dexcom adhesive starts to loosen after a couple of days and by the end of a week is barely holding the sensor in place. The sensor, though, is still working fine and it's expensive to unnecessarily replace it.)
customer_reviews.author: WB Halper

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Removes adhesive well.
customer_reviews.text: This product get the adhesive off my skin easily. You don't have to rub very hard. I use it to remove the residue from a fentanyl patch. Each pad is the perfect size. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: christene

customer_reviews.title: One of the best removers out there
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Ostomy you MUST get all the prior adhesive off before applying new appliance. Now that our insurance no longer covers the removers, which is just insane to me, I found these to be more affordable and better at getting all adhesive off. You do need to clean the surface before adding new appliance just to make sure all the residue left from the wipes and old stuff is really off.
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: works good for me
customer_reviews.text: I have to use tegaderm and it always left a dirt ring on my skin (usually lint from clothing caught on the edges of the tegaderm) This product works great at removing the leftover adhesives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The "star" features don't really apply to this product, but it gets a 5 star rating from me. I wear the Libre 14-day blood sugar sensors. It's always been tough to get the adhesive off once I remove a sensor, but these little wipes work great! They have plenty of moisture, so don't dry out before I'm done using them, and they work well to remove the stubborn tackiness left on my arm.
customer_reviews.author: L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, we use this in a bit of a different way. We used Torbot, moleskin and breath right strips to get our German Shepherd's ears to stand up. These adhesive remover wipes were to clean up when the moleskin fell off. We also had to use them when only half of the moleskin was flopping. Worked like a charm. Got the Torbot residue right off!
customer_reviews.author: Seabee wife

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: After a hospital stay, I tried all the usual “home remedies” to remove adhesive residue from heart monitor tabs and tape used to attach IVs. Nothing worked well. Then someone told me to order these. UniSolve wipes removed all the black residue marks without irritating my skin. It is an excellent product! I wish I’d known it existed right away.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good $
customer_reviews.text: Do dialysis every night on husband & have to change medical tape. Cleans area so good & also cleans his tubing. Insurance company supplies remover but don’t like. I’ve never had a dry packet on others many are dry. These are made so I can fold over & use again. Others are just small square. Great product & reasonable, much more in pharmacy. I have these on repeat order.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Paint thinner in wipe form
customer_reviews.text: This is paint thinner. Smells exactly like it & the damage it did to a computer I was cleaning proved it. I thought these would be more like chempads, but I was dead wrong. It got the adhesive mess that covered this PC quickly, but peeled the paint off as well. By the time I noticed what was happening it was too late. I ended up torturing myself by using goo gone to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nizel A.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product came just as ordered. Tried it the day it arrived and it worked perfect to remove the annoying bandage adhesive left on the skin after removing bandage. No doubt it would help with bandage removal for people with sensitive skin. It removed all of the adhesive quickly with no side effects at all. Other than the slight chemical smell that was easily removed with a damp washcloth, the product is just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair to good product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 3-Star, because they work, but not well for me. They work as advertised. They do remove any gummy tape residue easily and quickly. But if you have any problem with alcohol, they aren't for you. If you have any kind of cut, scratch or abrasion, it will burn like crazy. Also the alcohol dries the skin which is already stressed from the dressing that was on it and it's removal. And I find that that stings nearly as bad, as well as it weakening the skin by drying it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy L.

customer_reviews.title: Doberman glue removal - one wipe
customer_reviews.text: I used skin cement glue on my doberman's ear posting, This instantly took off the sticky gross adhesive left behind after post removal. I had previously tried a ton of rubbing alcohol to rub it off but that failed, I only needed one of these tiny wipes. to remove a ton of gunk. I highly recommend this, well worth every penny. Plus it is individually wrapped so I can store the rest of the wipes for future use on other things later. The box I received does not expire for another 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: MARG

customer_reviews.title: Best way to get rid of leftover adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever if you have to clean adhesive off your skin. I’m diabetic and use this to take old adhesive goo from sensors and infusion sets off my skin. I looked everywhere and found this. It is a blessing! It makes getting your skin clean and adhesive free easy.
customer_reviews.author: BobbieD

customer_reviews.title: Just alcohol wipes
customer_reviews.text: My physician recently RX'ed one the blood sugar monitors to keep track of my glucose levels. The sensor leaves a residue when I take it off my arm. So I bought these thinking they would, as marketed, remove the adhesive. Wrong! It's mostly just alcohol so I would've done better simply using the alcohol wipes I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Works very well at dissolving adhesives on skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! It easily removes medical tape without much skin damage. One just needs a little patience to allow the product time to dissolve the glue. I highly recommend if you have any kind of skin condition. Personally, any adhesive will cause a problem for me except for dissolving medical glue.
customer_reviews.author: Michi-gal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: I had open heart surgery and the tape gunk was still on there after a month, I tried alcohol, nail polish remover, and many other things, Nothing worked, UNTIL I tried Uni Solve Adhesive Remover, it took off the gunk right away ! Great Product !!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing adhesive remover.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Doberman pup, and her ears are cropped. For health reasons, the posts have to be removed every few days, often well before the adhesive gives. This product is amazing. Gentle on her skin, prevents pulling her hairs out and even loosens torbot. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I used to use plain alcohol wipes to ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I used to use plain alcohol wipes to remove adhesive residue with moderate success. I was skeptical if these would work any better when I found them but decided to give them a try. Wow, what a difference! I'm not sure if the difference is the textured pad but these work 10X as good with little effort. I have already placed an order for more and will never be without them again. Definitely 5 big stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sniper in 223

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what i'd do without these. These adhesive removers work really great. My daughter wears the omni pod for her diabetes and the adhesive on the pod sticks really well so when we have to change it, we use the adhesive remover to take it off. The adhesive remover makes it simpler and less painful to take off. We have been using these for over 5 years and definitely can't beat the price. I would highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Benvenuto Curry

customer_reviews.title: Don't use if you have latex allergies
customer_reviews.text: I developed a rash after using the uni solve. Don't use if you have latex allergies. I must say though that they work really well at removing the adhesive. I am donating the rest of mine to the diabetes education center that i go to for them to give out for people to try.
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: I used this because my love one has a colostomy and he needs to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this because my love one has a colostomy and he needs to remove the sticky residue around his stoma and I find that I like this one because it has a lot of solution so it does not dry up fast like other brands and it really does remove the adhesive well. The issue is that it does sting if the skin is irritated but if the skin is healthy than it does not irritate. so usually when I get closer to the stoma I use a different brand wipe that is for sensitive areas but that wipe dries too fast and use this wipe for the outer areas.
customer_reviews.author: Smuffins

customer_reviews.title: Finally Something Someone Git it Right
customer_reviews.text: I've sat and watch the hospitals just pull my patients skin off trying to get adhesive bandages off. I had to research and find something that would work. This is the product. They are individually wrapped. If it's a band aid you're trying to get off, open the package, pat the adhesive portion of the band aid til saturated, wait s few seconds snd watch the magic happen. Not only is it painless, but your patient will live you. It's a little pricey, but I don't mind knowing I'm protecting my patient and lived ones
customer_reviews.author: sassy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Removing Adhesive Residue from Continue Glucose Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have Medtronic's CGM and switched from the Sof-Sensor to the Enlite sensor, which requires an adhesive overtape (which comes with the sensors) that the Sof-Sensor didn't use. Previously I'd used Smith & Nephew's IV3000 (which I still use) to cover the transmitter. I'd been using wipes and alcohol pads to remove adhesive from the transmitter, and found that the new adhesive is too sticky for my old method to work. I bought the Uni-Solve wipes based on product reviews and they surpassed my expectations. The adhesive residue comes off quickly and completely. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so useful to keep on hand!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to help remove the electrodes from an at home heart monitor study. We bought them about halfway through the study because we were having a hard time replacing the electrodes as needed. We wish we had bought them sooner! Now we keep a box in our medicine cabinet, just in case. I would say they easily removed 95% of the adhesive with little scrubbing/effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a trip to the store and some money!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product that I have been using for years. Previously, when I ran out, I would visit my local medical supply store, but this time with the Coronavirus, it was not so easy. The small stores were closed or didn't have the product, so I thought of Amazon. The adhesive remover pads were available for less money and I received them the next day with free shipping! What better deal could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product to remove remaining residue after removing surgical dressings
customer_reviews.text: I have had 6 surgeries in 2 months. I was tired of all the funk on my skin after removing the surgical dressings. This product worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R.

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using alcohol wipes to remove adhesive remnants from bandage tape but it always left a residue. This stuff works like magic! It leaves your fingers a little slippery with a coating but washed out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing bandage adhesives
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product. It works great for removing adhesives from bandages. I have also used it to remove stickers and price tags. It is easy to use and works well removing stickiness. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy removal of diabetes management devices.
customer_reviews.text: My child wears a dexcom and omnipod and these are a must for easy removal. Just wipe, let sit for a minute and then they peel right off. No pulling of hair or irritated skin. You do have to thoroughly clean the skin afterwards but that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: WalkingJL

customer_reviews.title: Better than alchohol wipes
customer_reviews.text: These things work soooo incredibly well! As a type one diabetic, I use both an insulin pump and a continuous glucose monitor. The adhesive for both these devices (and the medical tape that's sometimes necessary to add) tends to leave a residue on my skin that's difficult to scrub off. I've tried many different alcohol wipes and other substances and good old fashion soap and water but these wipes are the only thing that does the trick in one easy step!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: For Pumpers and CGM Wearers
customer_reviews.text: These are a must-have for removing adhesives from your body. I wear both an insulin pump and a continuous glucose monitor (CGM) and without these wipes I would be in a lot of pain removing my pump and cgm. Easy to use and conveniently individual count, these wipes remove all the adhesive gunk on your skin. Be sure to wash your sites or use rubbing alcohol where your site is to further remove the gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Best medical device adhesive removal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for removing leftover adhesive from insulin pump infusion sets. Prior to purchasing this item, I tried everything from soap and H20 to rubbing alcohol to remove appliance adhesive from skin. I was left with extreme redness and at times, skin tears when I changed my infusion sets. This product removes leftover adhesive quickly and thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: A. Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cannula Removal
customer_reviews.text: Both of my babies have had to be on oxygen and we have to use tender grips to keep their cannulas on their faces (salter labs are the best tender grips with the best adhesion) These are amazing at not only loosening the grips on their faces so it doesn’t hurt to pull off, but also clean up the skin nicely once’s the grips have been removed.
customer_reviews.author: M&M345

customer_reviews.title: Best adhesive remover
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of the "tape stickies" from my medical devices. I've tried the baby oil and the rubbing alcohol and nothing worked. I decided to try this and it's a miracle worker! I use it to get my diabetes sensors off after 10 days and the tape stickies around them. It leaves a residue but nothing that some warm water and soap on a washcloth can't take off.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for HRT patch adhesive removal
customer_reviews.text: These are very powerful and removes the adhesive from my skin without leaving a greasy nasty mess. I like how they come in 2's also and the packaging for them are sturdy enough to throw in my purse. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: An adhesive remover every children's hospital should carry.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son had a surgery about a month ago which required a bandage to be placed. After a day or two at the hospital the bandage started to come off, requiring a replacement. The nurse basically just ripped the bandage off, making my son scream. When we went home, I did some reading to find a less painful alternative and came across these. They've worked really well to make the bandages less sticky, and I can just take them off without bothering my son at all. It makes me wonder why hospitals don't carry these!
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: This little pad works wonderfully to remove all that adhesive residue and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an insulin pump and have to tape down my infusion set as well as my continuous glucose monitor; when removing the various tapes, there's always some residue left behind. This little pad works wonderfully to remove all that adhesive residue and it does it gently and painlessly. It's like a wet-nap that you'd get at a restaurant except it's soaked in alcohol and adhesive remover. Love it! Also, it works great as a "goo-be-gone" on any non-porous surface. I just used a wipe the other day to remove all the residue left behind by a price tag left on a glass I just bought. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kornika King

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes my son who has type 1 diabetes likes to use to remove his omnipod or dexcom patches. It doesn't irritate his skin and gets the sticky residue off pretty easily. Buy them...it's a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ray

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, worked FAR faster than 2 other types I got from doctor offices. A few wipes and the adhesive residue is gone instead of 10 minutes of scrubbing to remove a bit of it! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to clean a decal off of our laptop and it worked great! Since we had so many wipes left over we thought “why not use it to try and remove this gunk off our floor that won’t come off when we mop?” And, as you can see, it worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: One wipe removed 2 4x3 tegaderm in seconds. 6yr old has large surgical wound on leg and this product has made removing and changing dressings as painless as possible. Worth it and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Another Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Transmitter Easily
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started using Continuous Glucose Monitoring, and for those of you who use CGM, you know how much tape you have to put over the transmitter to keep it securely on. All this tape leaves gunk all over the transmitter, so how do you clean it off? This product works like a dream: It wipes the gunk off the transmitter in just a couple strokes. Easy to use, effective. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Crow

customer_reviews.title: Gentle enough for my baby’s cheek
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to remove waterproof medical tape and tegaderm from my 14 month old sons face when he had a feeding tube. It removes adhesive quickly, with virtually no rubbing needed, and without skin irritation. The one drawback of this product is that it leaves a greasy residue from the wipes once you’re done removing the adhesive. It requires cleaning with soap and water, so it was difficult to use when I needed to replace the tape quickly while we were on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not the "please scent" advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have three infants on home oxygen so use adhesive remover wipes daily to gently remove the nasal cannula. I purchased these because they were advertised as "pleasant scent" but that is not the case at all. These wipes smell like nail polish remover! No thank you, this is not a scent I want around my babies' faces. I am going back to purchasing the Hollister 7760 Adhesive Barrier Remover Wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must for Med kit!
customer_reviews.text: Works absolutely amazingly! Whether it's a bandaid you have on still or residue from bandages it works so great! Absolute must of you're going for surgeries or just for an old small bandage love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha & Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best of it's kind
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my son's Dexcom sensor removal. We've recently switched to using Vaseline instead as it doesn't pull his skin at all. However, out of all the other adhesion removal products, this was by far our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Am 95, so skin is like tissue paper. This is first product I've found that removes medical tape painlessly - but need to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin B.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Removes all bandaging residue completely. Great to use with regular bandage changes or adhesive tape that is difficult to remove or leaves a lot of residue behind. Takes it all right off!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle_Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good adhesive remover. Extremely quick ship. Leaves a stringy gummy residue when removing my wound bandages where stuck to my hair but that may not avoidable. Cleanly removes ostomy pouch, no residue. I use about 3 pcs a day so this is a reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica NY

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: This works really good. After 2 weeks of changing the bandages everyday after my surgery there was nothing left of the skin. This made it so easy to get everything off without all of the raw skin pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smith And Nephew Uni-Solve Adhesive Remover
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years to remove the adhesive from my skin left by a medication I take through a patch. The patch must be left on for 72 hours at a time and it has a strong adhesive so that the user can shower in those three days without the patch coming off. However, after removing the patch, my skin inevitably has a significant amount of adhesive from around the margins of the patch. This product is a soft material that is saturated with the solvent in aluminum-wrapped single-use packets. It is easy to use and the solvent comes off easily after it removes the adhesive, using light soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: works well to remove the goo
customer_reviews.text: these little guys do the job ! not only do i use it to clean off the silicon from my dentures i can use them to remove the stickers off my glassware lol
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: If your here because you have a cgm just buy these
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new dexcom g5 user and I was very surprised how much the adhesive from the sites stay on your skin. I took out my first site almost a week ago and the adhesive was still there. I probably could have scrubbed it off in the shower but not without irritating my skin. With these it took less than a minute to take it off. My skin hasn't even reddened. It also took off the residue from skin-tac.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for infusion set changes!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my son's insulin pump infusion set. The adhesive is really good on the infusion set, and my son had trouble ripping it off. It was really uncomfortable for him. With Uni Solve, they just peal right off. You just have to take a little extra time to wipe the leftover adhesive off the skin. Still much better and less painful then just ripping them off.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job of removing medical tape from our babies cheek! Our baby has an NG so we have to replace the tape every week. He never cries while we remove the tape because this dissolves the adhesion so well. My only reason for 4 stars is because it has a bit of an odor. That only bothers me because it’s on his face.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing! Swab a few times and all the sticky residue from a bandage, glucose sensor, or other medical sticky is gone for good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mangione

customer_reviews.title: Worst mistake
customer_reviews.text: This stuff I got for my insulin pump have used it twice it smells horrible and leaves a sticky residue on the site so any dirt lint or piece of cat fur sticks to u
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The box is damaged please have the carriers to make not of this
customer_reviews.author: Walter Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works better than anything else I have used to remove that very hard to remove adhesive from tape and bandaids. I recently had heart surgery and had adhesive tape over my incision which left adhesive on the sensitive area next to my scar. This product removed the adhesive with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Stimmell

customer_reviews.title: Unisolve wipes or liquid
customer_reviews.text: Unisolve is a tape remover, it is a good product to remove tape on the skin after surgery and skin traumatize after multiple surgeries. Pain Freeeeeee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great remover and had bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about these remover pads. They didn’t remove the bandage adhesive well at all, then one if us had a bad reaction to the ingredients and
customer_reviews.author: TheFarmersWifeWithTwins

customer_reviews.title: Works great on anything sticky you want to get off, of almost anything. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works great for getting anything sticky off. Much better than GooGone and some other products. I first started using it after a surgery where I have bandages to remove, but had some left over so started using it for other things. Works well so I bought some more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E Forney

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these working as a nurse in hospital, and wanted some for home. They are pricy but I used rewards!!
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: these wipes REMOVE ADHESIVE great
customer_reviews.text: got these to remove adhesive from surfaces after "spills" from crafting. They work great! No stretch. They Do Not stick.
customer_reviews.author: B.N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used them a lot to remove the EKG tabs when I was on the hospital. I also use them to remove the residue from sticky labels.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This makes taking my daughters insulin pump off very easy.
customer_reviews.author: kristen volpe

customer_reviews.title: It works. Removes bandaid without ripping skin.
customer_reviews.text: Most bandaids have super strong adhesive and I have thin skin. This liquid easily loosens the bandaid. A must for anyone with injury that needs adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynornews

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and removes and adhesive so quickly and pain free. AMAZING!! If your kids cry when it’s time to take off the band aid get this. If you have the Dexcom meter get this stuff to remove it. I’m obsessed
customer_reviews.author: sharda braxton

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Used it the same day I got it to remove band-aid adhesive and it worked great. Using alcohol, it would take me days to get it all off. I would recommend this for everyone who deals with the same frustration. I will never be without this, now that I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive remover
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to remove adhesive from bandages on skin. Cheaper than some other brands snd it still got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W. OC

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the appearance of the box. The outside shipping box was fine, which means this was pulled from the shelf in this condition. Not at all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lisalem

customer_reviews.title: gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: great adhesive remover! great to have these around the house. I bought for my dog and glad I don't have to use on her anymore but would trust nothing else. I use them anytime I want an effective but gentle adhesive remover.
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Best adhesive remover ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these regularly to remove waterproof bandages from a Dexcom CGM and find that if you wipe on top of the bandage, this product will remove it easily. This is especially nice for people with a lot of hair that would otherwise be painful when pulled. I really appreciate this product!! The larger size such as this is better, but both are great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have for removal of bandages or tape residue. Wipe the edge of the bandage as you remove. Helps reduce the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sean L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and removes with little effort
customer_reviews.text: This removes adhesive really well. We use it to remove the adhesive’s for my son’s gaurdian sensor for his Medtronic 670g, which is held into place with 3 different adhesive patches. This does what scrubbing and soaking does in a 1/10 of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I’d recently started using the SimPatch adhesives to secure my Freestyle Libre sensor & found that they left a bit of residue after being removed. These wipes help to easily remove super-sticky adhesives as well as the ring that remains on your skin from them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HDBK

customer_reviews.title: Love this prodcut!!!
customer_reviews.text: This medical tape adhesive remover doesn't irritate my sensitive skin!!! Have this remover in little wipe packets make it so much easier for me to remove tape adhesive on the go, especially for long hospital trips!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blu422

customer_reviews.title: Removes stubborn adhesives.
customer_reviews.text: This works great to remove left over adhesive. I use a two week pass ch that leaves behind hard to remove adhesive. This removes it completely with one or two towelettes.
customer_reviews.author: D B Gudmundson

customer_reviews.title: Get alcohol wipes instead and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because when I use my Dexcom sensor, it leaves a residue that I can’t remove from my skin. The odor is very strong and not worth the price. I tried using alcohol wipes and it works just as effective and cheaper! FYI,,,,,this product is not returnable!!!
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Stings a Bit
customer_reviews.text: This product works good but if the adhesive has caused a rash or raw spot be prepared for some pretty good stinging.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing Product ! ! My daughter has type one diabetes and this has made our lives easier ! ! Highly Recommend ! !
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bembenek

customer_reviews.title: Stings like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I got these to remove adhesive around a would, thinking it would be gentler on my irritated skin than alcohol. Wrong. No difference from using alcohol swabs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Wish the smell was better GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: These work well on skin and items! I just wish the smell wouldn’t be so strong for the use of the product! They REALLY WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe allergy to adhesive and usually get a terrible burning pain every time I remove something with adhesive. I got these because I had to do a 48 hour heart monitor and knew it would be bad. Using these changed everything. They are a life saver. I would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan S

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes don't work at all what a waste of money! Can't return them. They do not remove sticky adhesive residue from your skin at all. Don't waste your money. Use baby oil instead!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a type 1 Diabetic that uses a pump and CGM. Makes changing out sites easy. I have tried many brands, this brand is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Cable933

customer_reviews.title: Glue remover
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought for removing glue & loose props after propping dogs ears. Gets it off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sfelts1981

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: After weeks in the hospital and what seemed like tons of leftover tape adhesive. These took it all off with little effort
customer_reviews.author: Paul Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use with my insulin pump supplies. They work really well to get off adhesive. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Easy adhesive removal.
customer_reviews.text: No pain adhisive removal of ekg monitor adhesive. Works great for easy wipe off of glue reside.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett W

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product! I've used quite a few over the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I've used quite a few over the past three months. Some were tiny but lubricated well, others were large but did not have very much of the remover on the wipe. I found this wipe to be large enough to do the job and with enough lubrication to have to use only one wipe to remove the bag. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses to remove her insulin pump site. She hated removing before; said it hurt more than injection. Now with unisolve doesn’t bother her at all. Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wrightstone

product_meta.title: Uni Solve Adhesive Remover Wipes, 50 Each
product_meta.description:
Package Quantity:1Uni Solve Adhesive Remover Wipes, 50 Each. Precautions:Use only as directed. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Vapour may be harmful - use with adequate ventilation. Flammable. Do not use near heat, sparks or open flame. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with painted/finished surfaces. Do not apply to open wounds or mucous membranes.Indications:Indicated for the removal of adhesive devices. Indicated for the removal of adhesive residue from skin.Softens adhesive on tapes, films and appliances thereby minimizing trauma caused by adhesive removal.INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE:Step 1:Apply UNI-SOLVE Adhesive Remover with cotton applicator, or gauze to edge of tape or appliance.Squeeze gently so fluid flows between skin and adhesive.Step 2:Wash skin with soap and water, rinse, and pat dry.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
800-876-1261
feature_bullets: Uni Solve adhesive remover wipes are indicated for the removal of adhesive residue from skin
Pleasant fragrance with no harsh odor
